title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning Assessment Tool Development Course for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Development of blended learning assessment tools using smartphone-centric math education simulations/VR content in limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the applicability of Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) tools in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can develop four or more satisfaction survey items for simulation/VR-based math learning activities
Learners can explain methods to validate the reliability and validity of assessment tools available in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
